participant_1.background:
I spent time with my kids and family on my last birthday.
i have a dog and two cats.
i graduated valedictorian of my high school class.
i smoke a pipe.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.

participant_2.background:
I drive my car to work at an insurance firm.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonalds.
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh.

content.text: Happy Birthday! I hope you had a great day.
Thanks! I spent time with my kids and family.
That sounds lovely. I spent time with my kids and my dog.
That is nice. I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy, last year.
I am so sorry to hear that. I have a hunting dog and he is my best friend.
I love having a dog around because they always make me laugh.
Me too. They are the best companions.
I have to be careful with my hair color because of my theater commitments.
What do you do in theater?
That sounds like a lot of fun!
What kind of roles do you play?
I play all kinds of roles. I just finished playing a villain in a production of Macbeth.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am sure you were great.
